title: Weird handwritten connected script
content:
if anyone can help me out and identify this font, i really need it. thanks a lot ;)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [fonte2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907032636/http:/typophile.com/files/fonte2.jpg) | 13.9 KB |

 [‹ "Creative" Bauhaus-like geometric sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907032636/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38339 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) 2nd Annual CSC OptiFair 2007 scripts - Nuptial Script, Young Baroque {Loremipsum, Mike E} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907032636/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38332 "Go to next forum topic")
author: olivia

comments.content: Looks like something Veer would have, Mr. or Mrs.something or other. I couldn’t find an exact match in a quick search.

\> Mr. or Mrs.something or other

That sounds like Sudtipos. I checked that. Nope.

The font doesn’t look all that great. Freeware maybe?
